characteristic.__text: Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
**^^Spell^^**, **^^Unlimited^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit wholly within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s weapons until the start of your next turn.
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** unit wholly within 12" of them, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that friendly unit
If this unit is not a **^^Wizard^^**, it can use the ‘Unbind’ ability as if it had **^^Wizard (1)^^**. Otherwise, add 1 to this unit’s power level.
For the rest of the turn, friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units have **^^Ward (5+)^^** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
Subtract 1 from hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made by the target for the rest of the turn.
You can use the ‘Sneaky Sneakin'’ **^^Dirty Trick^^** ability twice per turn instead of only once per turn.
**Companion** weapons used by friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units have **Crit (2 Hits)**.
Friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units that are wholly within 3" of a terrain feature are not visible to enemy units that are more than 12" away from them.
Your Shooting Phase
Pick up to 3 friendly **Man-skewer Boltboyz** or **Beast skewer Killbow** units to be the targets.
For the rest of the turn, add 3" to the Range characteristic of the targets’ ranged weapons.
Any Combat Phase
If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, it can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly non-**^^Hero Kruleboyz^^** Infantry unit:
• This unit has **^^Ward (4+)^^**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly non-**^^Hero Kruleboyz Infantry^^** unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).
End of Any Turn
Pick an enemy **^^Hero^^** in combat with both this unit and another friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** unit to be the target.
Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Add 1 to the mortal damage inflicted for each friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** unit in combat with the target in addition to the first two **^^Kruleboyz^^** units.

Your army can use 1 **^^Dirty Trick^^** ability per phase. The effect of a **^^Dirty Trick^^** ability is only applied if you make a successful dirty trick roll. The success of a dirty trick roll depends on the number of **^^Dirty Trick^^** abilities your army has already used this battle round:
**First:**  2+
**Second:** 3+
**Third:** 4+
**Fourth or subsequent:** 5+
Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Infantry^^** unit to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
Until the start of your next turn, the target’s attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.
**^^Dirty Trick^^**
Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with any friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. In addition, for the rest of the turn, the target’s weapons cannot be affected by the Charge (+1 Damage) weapon ability
**^^Dirty Trick^^**
Once Per Turn (Army), Any Movement Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Kruleboyz Infantry^^** unit that has 10 or fewer models and is not in combat to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 3" of a terrain feature and more than 9" from all enemy units.
**^^Dirty Trick^^**
Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
Pick an enemy unit in combat with any friendly **^^Kruleboyz^^** units to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
The target has **^^Strike-last^^** for the rest of the turn.
**^^Dirty Trick^^**
